metadata.name: Flow Type
metadata.description: DAC/CRS distinction between ODA (official development assistance) and other types of resource flow.

21.name: OFP de créditos que não à exportação
21.description: Other Official Flows, excl. export credits

22.name: Créditos à exportação com apoio público
22.description: Officially supported export credits. Covers both official direct export credits and private export credits under official guarantee or insurance

30.name: Financiamento privado ao desenvolvimento
30.description: Financing by civil society organisations (NGOs, philantropic foundations, etc.)

35.name: Mercado privado
35.description: Private long-term (i.e. over one-year maturity) capital transactions made by residents of DAC countries

37.name: Outros fluxos privados aos termos do mercado
37.description: Private long-term (i.e. over one-year maturity) capital transactions made by residents of DAC countries

50.name: Outros fluxos
50.description: e.g. non-ODA component of peacebuilding operations
